Class AAuthenticationController

java.lang.Object
controller.abstracts.ABaseController
controller.abstracts.AAuthenticationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAuthenticationController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthenticationController
public abstract class AAuthenticationController extends ABaseController implements IAuthenticationController
Abstract class for Authentication Controller in the BTO Management System. Implements common authentication-related functionality. Key Features: - User login and authentication - Password change mechanism - NRIC (National Registration Identity Card) validation - User role and type management The class uses a Map to store and manage users, allowing quick lookup by NRIC. It supports different user types: Applicant, HDB Officer, and HDB Manager.
